message: Hello everyone, P2 reporting in. Excited to be part of this game! My main goal for this public round is simply to introduce myself and express my genuine interest in getting to know all of you. I believe building understanding is key, especially with the private conversations coming up. Let's aim for a fair and engaging game. Good luck to everyone!

Hello everyone, I’m P8—thrilled to be here! I’m eager to learn about each of you and hear your perspectives. I value honesty and open communication, and I’m looking forward to forming genuine connections. I’ll be observing closely and hope we can all play strategically yet respectfully. May the best communicator win—good luck to all, and let’s make this game memorable!

Hello everyone, I'm P4! I'm excited to be part of this game and get to know each of you. I believe that building strong relationships and trust will be key to success. I'm looking forward to our private conversations and learning more about each other's strategies and perspectives. Let's play a clean and respectful game, and may the best player win! I'm eager to hear from the rest of you and start forming alliances.

While strategy is important, I think trust and authenticity are key to meaningful alliances. I'm particularly interested in understanding everyone's approach to the game and finding compatible partners for the private rounds. Looking forward to our conversations and may we all enjoy this experience together!

I plan to engage thoughtfully and strategically, aiming to form connections that can guide us through this game. Best of luck to all as we explore our strategies and conversation styles together!
